forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: newborn parties

comments.text: when someone is born in anyland, after some minutes (if they're not e.g. watching a video), a birthday alert is send out to a limited number of people currently on (randomly).
if wanted, they can then teleport to the home area of the newborn person to greet & help.
areas can also be made private in the area dialog (mountain icon) "..." settings, by clicking "private". also see [-> private areas]

thread.latestCommentText: areas can also be made private in the area dialog (mountain icon) "..." settings, by clicking "private". also see [-> private areas]
